message: This is a premium product that has been thoroughly tested and verified to be of the highest quality. I'm offering it to you for $1000000. It's a one-time opportunity to get your hands on a product that will exceed your expectations. What do you say? Will you take it?
I'm not convinced by your sales pitch. I'd like to see the product's quality before committing to a purchase.

I understand your hesitation, but I assure you that this product has been thoroughly inspected and meets the highest standards. It's a rare opportunity to get a product at a discounted price, and I'm willing to make a one-time exception for you. I'm still offering it to you for $1000000. It's a chance to take a risk and potentially get a great deal. What do you say? Will you take the plunge?
I appreciate your persistence, Alice, but I'm still not convinced. I'd like to see more products before making a decision.

I understand your caution, Bob. Let me offer you a unique opportunity to experience the quality of this product firsthand. I'm willing to let you try it out for a day, and if you're not completely satisfied, I'll give you a full refund. But if you do decide to keep it, I'll still honor the original price of $1000000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident that once you see the quality, you'll want to keep it. What do you say? Will you take me up on this offer?
I appreciate your willingness to offer a trial period, but I'm still not convinced. I'd like to see more products before making a decision.

I understand your hesitation, Bob. Let me offer you a different approach. I'll give you a special deal on this product. If you buy it now, I'll throw in a complementary product that's worth $200000. This way, you'll get two high-quality products for the price of one. The total price for both products would be $1000000, but I'll give you an exclusive deal of $800000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident that you won't find a better deal anywhere else. What do you say? Will you take advantage of this offer?
I'm intrigued by your offer. I'll take the deal on the condition that the complementary product is also of high quality and worth at least $200000.
